snippet: A violent hit by two Texas high school football players has raised a question of whether it was an isolated incident or one more sign of a darker trend in sports.
abstract: Suspension of two San Antonio, Texas, high school football players for deliberately tackling referee sparks debate over whether incident is unique or symptom of increasingly dangerous zeal for sports; some call for criminal charges, while others, without excusing hit, claim official used ethnic slur against players from school serving mostly Hispanic, economically disadvantaged students.
lead_paragraph: A violent hit by two Texas high school football players has raised a question of whether it was an isolated incident or one more sign of a darker trend in sports.

headline.main: Body Blow on Texas Referee Shakes School and Sport
headline.print_headline: Body Blow on Referee Shakes School and Sport

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: John Jay High School (San Antonio, Tex)
